text: Rancho Mirage is a resort city in Riverside County, California, United States. The population was 16,999 at the 2020 census. The seasonal (part-time) population can surpass 20,000. Many famous people lived here including Frank Sinatra, Bob Hope, Fred Astaire, Ginger Rogers, Richard Nixon, Gerald Ford, Ronald Reagan, Queen Elizabeth II, and Tom Bosley. ==References== Category:Cities in California Category:Settlements in Riverside County, California
title: Rancho Mirage, California
